item.title: Thursday - Arab Street
item.description: Today was last day at Singapore. Packed everything night before so that after breakfast we can check-out without much wasting of time.It was holiday at Singapore as of some Muslim festival. My plan was to go to Arab Street. This area has beautiful old shop houses that line the streets.Â The highlight of the area is the grand Sultan Mosque, which was crowded as people were coming out after prayers.
